title: Manage Your Money During the Pandemic, with Jean Chatzky
description:
Financial expert, author and host of the podcast HerMoney with Jean Chatzky joins Jillian to talk about what’s going on with the market and the economy, and what people should be doing right now with regard to their finances. Plus, can you just walk for fitness?

Guest Links:

HerMony.com

HerMoney Podcast

Twitter & Instagram: @Jean Chatzky


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
